description: Explore the evolving regulatory landscape of blockchain project funding, focusing on Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs), Security Token Offerings (STOs), and decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs). Understand the legal, compliance, and cross-border challenges with insights into regulatory approaches in the U.S., EU, and Asia-Pacific.
keywords: blockchain, project funding, regulation, ICOs, STOs, DAOs, legal status, compliance, cross-border, SEC, CFTC, MiCA, DeFi, NFTs, financial sector, international cooperation
title: Navigating the Complex Landscape of Blockchain Project Funding Regulation
